author: Simon Difford
description: Bourbon's sweet notes are lifted and amplified by amaretto's almond flavours. For a slightly drier, more complex version of this drink try a Toasted Almond Old Fashioned.
name: Almond Old Fashioned (bourbon based)
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
